issues.description: The problem statement provides conflicting attribute orders for the constructor: the textual list (line 17) and the instruction (“follow the UML”) suggest one order (lectureName, numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors), but the UML diagram (lines 63–68) lists the attributes in a different sequence (numberOfInscribedStudents, lectureName, numberOfLecturers, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfTutors). The solution’s constructor signature follows the textual list rather than the UML, leading to confusion about the intended parameter order.
issues.suggested_fix: Unify the constructor parameter order across the UML and textual description. Either update the UML diagram to match the text/list order (lectureName first, then numberOfInscribedStudents, numberOfGuestStudents, numberOfLecturers, numberOfTutors) or revise the text and tests to follow the UML’s attribute sequence consistently.
